OrderAction.name: OrderAction
OrderAction.description: Indicates the type of order, such as a new sale or a cancellation.

Name.description: The name given to the order action.

OffsetOrderItemId.description: The ID of the previous order item that is being modified by the business action. For example, the order that is being canceled.

OrderId.description: The order containing the order item that implements the business action.

SourceAssetId.description: The asset that is changed as a result of the business action. For example, the asset that is being canceled.

Subtype.description: The subtype of the action on the order line item.

Type.description: The business action that created the order product.
